hero.subline: Fourth-year Computer Science student and competitive programmer. ACPC 2024 qualifier; ECPC 2024 rank 17; ECPCQ 2023 rank 3; Meta Hacker Cup 2023 Round 2 (1784th). Active on Codeforces (2000+) and LeetCode (600+).

coach.name: Omar Mohamed Sanad
coach.university: B.Sc. Computer Science — Suez Canal University (2021–present)
snapshot: Volunteer IT Head — ICPC Suez Canal Community; led DSA/problem-solving sessions and platform improvements.
projects: Traveling Website — Responsive front-end with HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Hotel Reservation System — Python project focused on file handling and data structures
Learn About Animals — Flutter/Dart educational app using OOP and clean code

items.q: What are Coach Sanad’s main areas of expertise?
items.a: Data Structures, Algorithms, competitive programming, and strong OOP/SOLID foundations.

items.q: Does Coach Sanad have teaching experience?
items.a: Yes — volunteered as IT Head at the ICPC Suez Canal Community, delivering DSA sessions and supporting contest/problem-set curation.
ACPC 2024 qualifier, ECPC 2024 rank 17, ECPCQ 2023 rank 3, Meta Hacker Cup 2023 Round 2 (1784th), thousands of solved problems.

footer.blurb: Empowering talent through hands-on, industry-aligned tech coaching.
